name: Zizle
description: Zizle is where social networking meets decentralization. It flips the script on traditional social networks. Built on the Solana blockchain, Zizle gives users control over their data and allows them to monetize their engagement. Zizle tokens reward your interactions, ensuring creators can transparently earn and grow their audience. Escape the toxic norms of traditional social platformsâ€”join Zizle for a genuine, community-focused social experience where your privacy and contributions are valued.
